io.r2dbc.spi

Interface ColumnMetadata

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ReadableMetadata

    public interface ColumnMetadata
extends ReadableMetadata
    Represents the metadata for a column of the results returned from a query. The implementation of all methods except ReadableMetadata.getName() is optional for drivers. Column metadata is optionally available as by-product of statement execution on a best-effort basis.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface io.r2dbc.spi.ReadableMetadata

        getJavaType, getName, getNativeTypeMetadata, getNullability, getPrecision, getScale, getType
